languages.text: "Предлагаю даровать аколиту Милость Императора. В память о годах нашего сотрудничества".
"I suggest granting the acolyte the Emperor's Peace. In honour of our years of working together."
languages.original_text: "Предлагаю даровать аколиту Милость Императора. В память о годах нашего сотрудничества".

traits.locale_text: "I suggest granting the Acolyte the Emperor's Peace. To honour the years of our cooperation."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I suggest granting the Acolyte the Emperor's Peace. To honour the years of our cooperation."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I suggest granting the acolyte the Emperor's Peace. In honour of our years of working together."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I suggest granting the acolyte the Emperor's Peace. In honour of our years of working together."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Je propose d'offrir la paix de l'Empereur à cette acolyte, en remerciement de nos années de coopération. »
languages.original_text: "I suggest granting the acolyte the Emperor's Peace. In honour of our years of working together."

traits.locale_text: « Je propose d'offrir la paix de l'Empereur à cette acolyte, en remerciement de nos années de coopération. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Sugiero que le conceda la Paz del Emperador a la acólita. Por respeto a nuestros años trabajando juntos».
languages.original_text: "I suggest granting the acolyte the Emperor's Peace. In honour of our years of working together."

traits.locale_text: «Sugiero que le conceda la Paz del Emperador a la acólita. Así honraría tantos años de cooperación».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我建议赐予这位侍仆‘帝皇安息’，纪念我们多年来的同事关系。”
languages.original_text: "I suggest granting the acolyte the Emperor's Peace. In honour of our years of working together."

traits.locale_text: “我建议赐予这位侍仆‘帝皇安息’，纪念我们多年来的合作。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「アコライトに皇帝陛下の安寧を与えることを提案します。長年の協力に敬意を表して」
languages.original_text: "I suggest granting the acolyte the Emperor's Peace. In honour of our years of working together."

traits.locale_text: 「アコライトに皇帝陛下の安寧を与えることを提案します。長年の協力に敬意を表して」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ich schlage vor, dem Akolythen den Frieden des Imperators zu gewähren. Zu Ehren unserer jahrelangen Zusammenarbeit."
languages.original_text: "I suggest granting the acolyte the Emperor's Peace. In honour of our years of working together."

traits.locale_text: "Ich schlage vor, dem Akolythen den Frieden des Imperators zu gewähren. Um die Jahre unserer Kooperation zu ehren."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Havari'ye İmparator'un Huzuru'nu bahşedelim. Yıllar boyu beraber çalışmamızın bir hatırı var."
languages.original_text: "I suggest granting the acolyte the Emperor's Peace. In honour of our years of working together."
